name: podamShouldAllowValidationAnnotationsCustomization

testSteps.description: Given a Podam Factory with custom strategy uk.co.jemos.podam.test.strategies.PatternStrategy@75650c for annotation interface javax.validation.constraints.Pattern
When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ValidatedPatternPojo
Then the pojo uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ValidatedPatternPojo@f8cfdc must be of the type class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ValidatedPatternPojo
Then the pojo 945544 must be of the type class java.lang.String
Then the pojo 4g2 must be of the type class java.lang.String
Then the POJO should not have any Validator violations for uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ValidatedPatternPojo@f8cfdc
Remove a custom strategy interface javax.validation.constraints.Pattern from a Podam Factory

title: Podam should allow validation annotations customization
